EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Wednesday in Toronto!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop. We look forward to seeing you next Wednesday, October 21 in Toronto.
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Wednesday, October 21, 2015 8:30am - 3:30pm (breakfast & lunch will be provided) Workshop Agenda > <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/toronto>
Pivotal 1 Toronto Street, Suite 1100, 11th Floor Toronto, ON M5C 2V6 Maps & Directions > <https://www.google.com/maps/dir//1+Toronto+St+%231100,+Toronto,+ON+M5C,+Canada/@43.6499311,-79.375757,17z/data=!4m13!1m4!3m3!1s0x89d4cb323c288245:0x750b0662dc419953!2s1+Toronto+St+%231100,+Toronto,+ON+M5C,+Canada!3b1!4m7!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x89d4cb323c288245:0x750b0662dc419953!2m2!1d-79.375757!2d43.6499311%22>
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-On Section
- VMware Player. Suggestions: VMware Player (Windows) OR VMware Fusion (MacOS). - RDP Client. Suggestions: coRD (MacOS), rDesktop (linux), Microsoft RDP (Windows)
*Access to VM instance will be provided
QUESTIONS? Please email Reshma Sinanan-Hill at rsinanan-hill@pivotal.io <mailto:rsinanan-hill@pivotal.io>.
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
P.S. - Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in joining you, please forward this link to the workshop details & registration <https://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/toronto>
